__e: Thanks to Claude and his daughter, you're all free to go.
Claude here is in love. The girl he's in love with is sitting right here in this room.
There is nothing between Claude and me, and what little there was... it's long in the past.
Cause if you don't, Claude, we've nothing left to say to each other.
And Claude didn't give a shit what anyone thought.
I told you a thousand times, Claude, that wasn't me that ratted you out.
